originalText: cc_bridgeDrunk
Start Element
drunk
::He mumbles something, but you can't make out what that is.::

::The obviously drunk man blocks your passage by planting himself on the narrow bridge, swaying from left to right and threatening to fall to his demise at any given moment. As you take a step closer to him, the overwhelming reek forces you to reconsider and take a step back in fear of losing consciousness and going down yourself.::
guard_drunk1
Would you be so kind to let me pass?
Sir, would you please let me pass? I'm in a bit of a hurry.
Just move, damn it! I haven't got time to waste!
Move your filthy, stinkin' body to some other place and let me pass!
English
Move before the Invictus, worm!
::[Intimidate]:: I'll throw you off this bridge if you don't move at once!
What if I gave you this mushroom brew... ::Show him the brew.:: Would you let me pass?
::Push him off the bridge.::
::Leave him be.::
context.npc_cc_bridgeDrunk_askFirstTime
::He opens his mouth to speak and by doing so contaminates the air even further with his odious breath. You take a few more steps back just to be safe.::
context.npc_cc_bridgeDrunk_askSecondTime
::Wide-eyed, he does move: backwards, and clumsily to the left - and off the bridge. ::
English

Ya can't, ya rathound faced ssson of a doodlarghagh! 

Ya, ya leave me *be*!

::The mere sight of mushroom brew awakes his half-closed eyes and switches on his salivary glands..::

Ya, ya got... *breeew*? It good? Balaught, eh?
Cc_DrunkGoesOffTheBridge
Don't tell me whatta d-d-do, ya Oligarchy-workin' pipe-succablurrrrghaugh...

::He's surprisingly silent for the first few seconds of his plummet, as if he hasn't yet processed what is happening to him. Soon, however, you hear a faint scream echoing from the darkness that swallows him whole.::
::He burps loudly, giggles, then returns to his drunken swaying.::
food.mushroomBrew
Oh, it's the best brew you'll ever taste! Just look at it, man!
I'd say it's pretty darn good.
It's mushroom brew. Just like any other brew, I guess.
::His reply ends with some incomprehensible muttering.::

Y-k-ya move, ya stinkin' rrrrathound! Aerrghoblaghondh...

*D-drop off*.
I ain't m-movin'. Ya can't make me! Ya blurhgbahgh...

Do ya know who I am? I am? Am I? Zone out! Ya laraghatbghugh! 

*Blargh*!

I ain't movin' for no no one... 

Damn ya'll tootas... mootas!
Lemme tell ya a thin' 'ere, p-pipeworker. 'Ere. Look! ::He points to his eyes.::This's m-my bridge, lis'n, lis'n, *lis'n*: Ain't movin' aaaaaanywhere - I'm *not*, damn it!
G... go back to Junkyard, *Sh*tinkyard or wherever ya c-came from, ya zoonargh-blagharbeghast...
::End Dialog.::
H-hardcore! Lemme! I loves me sum brew!
::The man starts jumping with joy but on his third way down he completely misses the bridge. ::
praem
